changeSet.sql:
DELETE FROM SECGROUPRIGHTS WHERE GRPID IN (SELECT GRPID FROM SECGROUPS WHERE GRPCODE = 'NEW_COLATERAL') AND RIGHTID IN (SELECT RIGHTID FROM SECRIGHTS WHERE RIGHTNAME = 'menuItem_CollectionInterface_InterfaceMapping');
DELETE FROM SECROLEGROUPS WHERE ROLEID IN (SELECT ROLEID FROM SECROLES WHERE ROLECD IN ('COLLECTIONS_MAKER', 'COLLECTIONS_APPROVER', 'AT_COLLECTIONS_MAKER') AND GRPID IN (SELECT GRPID FROM SECGROUPRIGHTS WHERE RIGHTID IN (SELECT RIGHTID FROM SECRIGHTS WHERE RIGHTNAME = 'menuItem_CollectionInterface_InterfaceMapping')));

changeSet.author: gopal.p
changeSet.sql: UPDATE SMTPARAMETERS SET SYSPARMVALUE = 'Y' WHERE SYSPARMCODE = 'MANDATE_ALW_PARTNER_BANK';
